mean_cn: n. 脚手架，搭脚手架的材料
mean_en: the metal poles and wooden boards that are used to build or support a scaffold (sense 1)
word_etyma: scaffold用支架支撑 + ing名词后缀 → scaffolding 脚手架
sentence: Construction workers climbed up the scaffolding during the building renovation.
sentence_trans: 建筑工人在装修的时候爬上了脚手架。
